posts.post_content:
I'd like to swap these for cards I need from E121 (80 or 12), W575-1, E220 or anything from E90-1, E92-E102, T204, T206 (EPDG back or SLers only), T212-3, T213-1, T216, T330-2.

The cards in the back scan are in the same position as in the front scan, ie, reference off the E90-1 Bailey (which is available) and the Ames is the Polar Bear, etc.

Thanks,
Andy
